reviewText: Star Wars fans, LISTEN UP. THESE ARE THE ORIGINAL UNTOUCHED VERSIONS OF THIS PHENOMENAL FILM TRILOGY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Each movie will be released in 2-disc special editions, with the choice of viewing of both the original versions and the DVD versions that was released in 2004. But, the orignials will have 2.0 Surround Sound. ITS FINALLY HERE!!!!!!!!!!
